name: Kuba's Basics the Forest Trip
description:
Go for a trip to one of darkest forest with everybody's favourite fella, Kuba!

This Baldi's Basics Field Trip Demo mod is new addition to Kuba's Basics series. I also have developed a mobile version but it doesn't seem to be working. I will give you access to it as soon as possible!

Additions:

-Crickets don't indicate if fire is about to go out anymore,

-Kuba has a shovel when he chases you, for whatever reason.

Will you get score as high as possible or will you get caught by Kuba when unsuccesfully escaping him? Try yourself!
